category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_DLName_required_on_export
preference.preference_description: Set the CATIA_DLName_required_on_export variable to determine management of DLNames during the Export process. Set the variable to: - NO: Do not require DLNames to export an assembly - VALIDATE: Do not require DLNames to export an assembly, but validate during the Export Spreadsheet Creation process. - YES: Require DLNames to export an assembly and validate.
